definition: difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]
forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount
competitive election (i.e. with more candidates than seats)

sentences.english: In the end, a substantial transfer from Saudi Arabia closed the gap.
sentences.chinese: 最終，由沙特阿拉伯劃撥的大量資金彌補了這一差額。

sentences.english: Argentina's trade balance with China swung into a deficit in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 阿根廷對華貿易差額在2008年轉爲逆差。

sentences.english: Indirect elections take place at the city level and above. We have multi-candidate elections for members of the CPC Central Committee.
sentences.chinese: 我們在中央委員會的選舉當中實行了差額選舉。

sentences.english: The difference between the two is the bank’s fee and profit.
sentences.chinese: 買方和賣方之間的差額就是銀行的費用和利潤。

sentences.english: The trade gap between imports and exports remained high.
sentences.chinese: 進出口貿易差額依然很大。

sentences.english: This funding gap must be filled.
sentences.chinese: 這一資助差額必須加以填補。

sentences.english: In any case, you want to distribute the difference.
sentences.chinese: 在這兩種情況下，都需要對差額進行分配。

sentences.english: The gap between income and expenditure has widened to 11%.
sentences.chinese: 收入和支出之間的差額已擴大到11%。

sentences.english: So there’s only one way to go for the margin, and that’s down.
sentences.chinese: 得到差額只有一個辦法，那就是下跌。

sentences.english: The resulting balance of -15% marked the third month in a row of declining sales.
sentences.chinese: 調查結果15%的差額標誌着銷售額連續三個月下降。

sentences.english: So we just exchange the bills and make up any difference in DM coins.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我們只能兌換紙幣並用馬克硬幣補齊差額。

sentences.english: The balance is forty-three thousand Hong Kong dollars.
The margin of sampling error was plus or minus 3 percentage points.
sentences.chinese: 抽樣錯誤的差額是正負3%。

sentences.english: Moreover, we have the multi-candidate elections for members of central committees in the central authorities.
sentences.chinese: 我們在中央委員會的選舉當中實行了差額選舉。

sentences.english: Quoting for ward differentials rather than forward rates has its reasons.
sentences.chinese: 報遠期差額，不報遠期匯率是有其道理的。

sentences.english: That is more than double the current shortfall.
sentences.chinese: 比現在的差額多一倍多。

definition: to borrow or lend money/debit and credit items on a balance sheet
